name: Progressive Technology Federal Systems
overview: Progressive Technology Federal Systems, Inc. provides content management and digital library solutions to federal government agencies, local and state governments, and academic institutions in the United States. The company primarily engages in building digital libraries and digitizing archival collections. It offers ArchivalWare, a Web-based text search and retrieval system for digital libraries that allows organizations to store, access, and manage digital archive collections within one system. The company also provides software and application development services, search portals, and geospatial imagery database solutions; declassification and FOIA processing services; digitization services; and document processing, classification, and categorization services. In addition, it offers library and IT support services, including onsite support for library science and information systems; integrated library systems (ILS) development and technical support; analytical services; and systems and COTS products integration. Further, the company provides staffing services for library, office, and information technology personnel; and IT consulting services, including ILS and portal systems design and management, network administration, library automation systems planning and upgradation, requirements analysis and needs assessment, software/hardware development, maintenance support, networking, and implementation to libraries and information resource centers. Progressive Technology Federal Systems, Inc. was founded in 1995 and is based in Bethesda, Maryland.
